message: Hello Bob, I have a fantastic product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $250.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I'm only able to pay $100 for it.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. However, I have to make a living, so I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can sell the product to you for $175.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer. I would like to counter with $150 for the product.
